life_date: Auguste Louis Lepère, French, Paris 1849–Domme, Dordogne 1918
provenance: [Eric G. Carlson Fine Prints and Drawings, New York, until 2000; sold in August for TKT, to Drake]; Harry Drake, St. Paul (2000-d. 2012; bequeathed to MIA)
title: Landing Stage at the River La Garonne, Bordeaux
